import Navbar from './Navbar' import Card from './Card' import { useState } from 'react' function Rooms(){ const [state, setstate] = useState(""); const [source, setsrc] = useState(""); const [Price, setPrice] = useState(""); const inputHandler=(event)=>{ setPrice(event.target.value) setstate(event.target.value) } const SourceHandler=(event)=>{ setsrc(event.target.value) console.log(event.target.value) } return( <>

) } export default Rooms
